name: Splash Carnival
description:
Welcome to SPLASH CARNIVAL!!
The ultimate paintball experience!

You have been chosen for this EXCITING rogue-like action!!

You just have to...
Grab the paint ball weapons!
Splash the enemy!!
And move forward!!!

This FANTASTIC carnival will be held ALL DAY LONG with non-stop EXCITEMENT!!

While our paintball weapons may lack durability, fear not! We’ll provide an abundance of versatile weapons.

Feeling tired from the intense combat action?
Take a rest in the vending machine room
explore the store!
Or immerse yourself in thrilling mini-games!

Welcome to SPLASH CARNIVAL!!
RUN!!
SPLASH!!
and SURVIVE!!!
